item.title: 亿万富翁甘瓦尔出售规模缩小的 IndiGo，融资 5.01 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁拉克什-甘瓦尔（Rakesh Gangwal）最近一次试图减持印度国际航空公司（IndiGo）股份的举动周四出人意料，因为他出售股份的规模缩小了。【原文：Billionaire Rakesh Gangwal’s latest attempt to pare his stake in IndiGo faced a surprise on Thursday, as the size of his share sale was reduced — a rare move for the Indian carrier, whose stock ranks among the world’s most valuable airlines.】

item.title: 债券市场的繁荣为投资者留下了薄如蝉翼的安全网
item.description: 由于经济乐观和过多的现金追逐过少的证券导致成本偏高，债券投资者正在接受多年来最小的补偿，以换取承担违约风险。【原文：Bond investors are accepting the smallest compensation in years in return for taking default risk, as a potent combination of economic optimism and too much cash chasing too few securities skews costs.】

item.title: 中国股市下跌，新兴市场股市连续第三天下跌
item.description: 新兴市场股市连续第三天下跌，原因是中国食品外卖领军企业美团发布盈利预警，以及英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Emerging-market stocks fell for a third day as China’s food delivery leader Meituan issued a profit warning and Nvidia Corp.’s results raised questions about the outlook for tech growth.】

item.title: 英国通胀再次飙升，最贫困家庭首当其冲
item.description: 官方数据显示，英国最贫困的家庭和租户在新一轮通货膨胀中首当其冲，这凸显了工党政府在兑现提高生活水平的承诺方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Britain’s poorest households and tenants are bearing the brunt of a fresh surge in inflation, according to official figures that underline the challenge facing the Labour government to deliver on its pledge to improve living standards.】

item.title: Revolut 考虑为可能在美国进行的收购聘请顾问
item.description: Revolut Ltd.一直在探索聘用投资银行家，因为该公司正在权衡收购美国一家贷款机构的可能性，以推动其在美国的发展。【原文：Revolut Ltd. has been exploring hiring investment bankers as it weighs the possibility of buying a lender in the US to catapult its growth in the country.】

item.title: 普洛斯永久信托基金因阿布扎比投资而创下两年来最大涨幅
item.description: 在获得阿布扎比投资局15亿美元投资后，全球物流公司普洛斯的美元永久债券创下两年多来最大涨幅。【原文：Global logistics firm GLP Pte.’s dollar perpetual bonds surged by the most in over two years after it secured a $1.5 billion investment from the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority.】

item.title: 克瓦查汇率走强，赞比亚通胀率降至两年低点
item.description: 由于货币走强有助于抑制进口成本，赞比亚的年度通货膨胀率在 8 月份降至近两年来的最低点。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation eased to an almost two-year low in August as a stronger currency helped curb import costs.】

item.title: 中国在加拿大贸易争端后预订澳大利亚油菜籽货物
item.description: 中国已经预订了至少三批澳大利亚油菜籽，有可能结束长达数年之久的冻结状态，因为在与主要供应国加拿大发生贸易摩擦之后，这个亚洲国家正在寻求多样化的油菜籽来源。【原文：China has booked at least three shipments of Australian canola, potentially ending a years-long freeze as the Asian nation seeks to diversify its sources following a trade fallout with major supplier Canada.】

item.title: JD.com 为 22 亿欧元收购德国 Ceconomy 寻求贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国电子商务公司京东正在与银行谈判，以筹集一笔欧元贷款，为其收购德国电子产品零售商Ceconomy的计划提供资金。【原文：Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com Inc. is in talks with banks to raise a euro-denominated loan to help fund its proposed acquisition of German electronics retailer Ceconomy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国内地交易员抛售香港股票数量创新高
item.description: 周四，中国内地投资者抛售了价值 204 亿港元（26 亿美元）的香港上市股票，创下历史新高，这表明中国的投资者大军正在香港股市的急速反弹中重返本地市场。【原文：Investors in mainland China sold a record HK$20.4 billion ($2.6 billion) worth of Hong Kong-listed stocks on Thursday, a sign the country’s army of investors are returning to their local market amid a breakneck rally.】

item.title: 欧洲央行雷恩警告：削弱美联储独立性会带来巨大风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，美联储的自主权数十年来首次受到考验，这将给市场和经济带来 "重大 "风险。【原文：The autonomy of the Federal Reserve is being tested for the first time in decades, leading to “significant” risks for markets and the economy, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 奇货可居：利兹-特鲁斯谈吞噬英国的 "厄运循环" (播客)
item.description: 如今，每个人都在谈论富裕的发达国家的高利率，同时警告最终的财政灾难。2022 年 10 月，时任英国首相的利兹-特拉斯公布了小型预算案，令金边债券市场大跌眼镜。如今，英国收益率曲线长端利率甚至更高。到底发生了什么？为什么现在对英国财政的可持续性和经济本身如此焦虑？在本期节目中，我们将讨论【原文：These days, everyone is talking about high interest rates across the rich, developed world, while warning of eventual fiscal disaster. But we may have gotten an early glimpse of this anxiety in October 2022, when then-UK Prime Minister Liz Truss unveiled her mini-budget that spooked the gilt market. Well today, rates at the long end of the British yield curve are even higher. So what’s going on? Why all this angst now about UK fiscal sustainability and the economy itself? In this episode, we spe】

item.title: 英国前总理利兹-特鲁斯警告央行未来将面临厄运
item.description: 英国前首相利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）曾指责英格兰银行为她历史上最短的任期埋下了祸根，她称赞美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）让世界各国央行更接近她所说的需要进行的清算。【原文：Liz Truss, the former UK premier who has blamed the Bank of England for her historically short tenure, praised US President Donald Trump for bringing the world’s central banks closer to what she said was a needed reckoning.】

item.title: 高盛和花旗认为欧股反弹将经受住法国大戏的考验
item.description: 华尔街顶级策略师认为，法国政府再次失败的风险已被市场计入价格，不足以破坏欧洲股市近二十年来相对于美国股市最好的一年。【原文：The risk of another failed government in France is already priced in by markets and won’t be enough to derail the best year for European equities relative to US stocks in almost two decades, according to top Wall Street strategists.】

item.title: 欧洲首次 "国防债券 "销售旨在利用投资者的狂热
item.description: 一家法国银行将于本周四发行首只旨在为欧洲国防开支提供资金支持的债券，以激发投资者对该领域的浓厚兴趣。【原文：The first bond designed to bankroll Europe’s defense spending is being offered by a French bank on Thursday, aiming to tap fervent investor interest in the sector.】

item.title: 美元走软，快递英雄下调全年利润展望

item.title: 苏富比将把拍卖系列带到阿布扎比，瞄准当地富豪
item.description: 苏富比拍卖行将于今年 12 月在阿布扎比推出其首个拍卖系列，因为阿布扎比正在加紧努力，力争成为全球艺术品和奢侈品的目的地。【原文：Sotheby’s will launch its first auction series in Abu Dhabi this December as the emirate steps up its bid to become a global destination for art and luxury.】
